clinical_study.brief_title: Dose-finding and Safety Study of SHR4640 in Subjects With Hyperuricemia
clinical_study.official_title: Dose-finding and Safety Study of SHR4640 in Subjects With Hyperuricemia (Asymptomatic and Gout)

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to assess efficacy and safety of SHR4640 in subjects with hyperuricemia.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with a serum uric level≤360μmol/l.

secondary_outcome.measure: Actual change from baseline in serum uric level.
